lines.text:
[singing]
I'm so very unhappy. I don't know what to do. My head is hot, my feet are cold... *achoo* I'm so very unhappy. There's only greens in view. I'm frozen stiff as a piece of ice... *achoo* I'd like to be a camel, and feel the desert breezes. I know I'd never have a cold... a camel never sneezes. Oh this is not the life for me. I shake until I'm blue. My nose is red and my tale is told... *achoo*
